content: >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version materials double - ended crochet hook size j crochet hook size h ca - approximately 4 skeins 5 oz tlc lustre - spruce cb - approximately 4 skeins 5 oz tlc lustre - natural yarn needle for weaving ends gauge 21 stitches x 20 row equals 6 square
